name: Between The Shadows
description:
Play with headphones for the best experience.

Summary:

A horror game where you must help the crewmember escape the spaceship! You are the ships AI, you can control whether the lights are on or off. You need to lead the last surviving member of the crew to safety using the lights. The crewmember will follow your light, but you can make them wait in a certain spot by turning on another light. Beware, the aliens will hunt the player if they are near! You can lead them away from the crewmember with your main light. The spikes will help you get rid of the aliens, but be careful, they can hurt the crewmember too!  

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys | Move Light (switch selection in the menu)

E | Light on / Light off 

Space | Snap to crewmember location (select in the menu)

Important:

The crewmember will follow the main light you move with the controls. If a second light is turned on the crewmember will move to that instead. Aliens will always move towards the crewmember unless they are distracted by the main light. 

Aliens make noise, it will be louder the nearer they are to the main light.

Spikes will kill Aliens or the crewman if they are touched. Will display in the top left corner when the alien is near crewman.

Have fun!
